body.name: Hiearcool USB C Hub, USB C Adapter, 7 in 1 USB C Dongle USB-C to HDMI Multi-Port Adapter Compatible for Thunderbolt 3 4 MacBook Pro Air Dell Lenovo HP Laptops and Other Type C Devices-Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 55 mins
features: UL/SGS Approved Hiearcool USB C Hub: The intelligent USB C Adapter has perfectly combined all the functions you need. USB C to HDMI hub equipped with USB3.0 x2, 4K@30 HDMI, SD/TF Card Adapter, and Up to 100W/20V/5A Type C Power Delivery charging port.
4K HDMI to USB C Hub: The USB C Hub provides you with lifelike 4K 3840 x 2160@30Hz HDMI images that bring an immersive 3D resolution experience.
100W Power Delivery Supported: The USB C Hub supports a 100W USB C pass-through charging, ideal for MacBook Pro/Air or and other USB c devices, your primary choice of USB C Hub.
Efficient USB C Hub: Two high-speed USB-A 3.0 ports capable of 5Gb/s transfer speed for quick data transfer & Charging up to 5V@0.9A. Plug and Play, No Software, Drivers required.
Travel Size SD/TF USB C Adapter: Aluminium Alloy Casting and 2.4ounce Pocket Size,5Gbps read and write, capacity up to 2TB cards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful! Definitely worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: This item has been a game-changer for my laptop. This multi-port adapter offers an array of convenient connections, making it a must-have accessory for enhancing productivity and connectivity. The 4K HDMI output delivers stunning, high-resolution visuals, perfect for presentations or streaming content on a larger screen. The ability to expand USB-C ports, including USB-A and USB-C PD, ensures that I can connect multiple devices simultaneously without any hassle. The build quality is robust and compact, making it easy to carry around in my laptop bag. It feels durable and capable of withstanding daily use. What's particularly impressive is the reliable performance and fast data transfer speeds, which are essential for seamless multitasking and file transfers. In summary, this has greatly improved my MacBook's functionality and connectivity options, making it an invaluable accessory for my work and entertainment needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Durable and Stylish USB C Hub for On-the-Go Connectivity
reviews.reviewText: I recently invested in a USB C Hub that has proven to be a game-changer for my connectivity needs, and I couldn't be more pleased with its performance. This compact device has seamlessly integrated into my daily routine, providing both durability and a sleek aesthetic.The first thing that caught my attention was the build quality. The USB C Hub boasts exceptional durability, with a solid construction that instills confidence in its longevity. The device feels sturdy and capable of withstanding the rigors of daily use, making it a reliable companion for those who demand durability from their tech accessories.Despite its robust build, the hub maintains a visually appealing design. The sleek and modern aesthetic adds a touch of sophistication to my workspace, elevating the overall look of my setup. It's refreshing to find a device that not only performs well but also complements the style of my other tech accessories.One of the standout features of this USB C Hub is its compact size. Small enough to fit in the palm of my hand, it's the ideal companion for those on the move. Whether I'm traveling for work or simply moving between home and the office, this hub easily slips into my bag without adding unnecessary bulk.Despite its size, the hub doesn't compromise on functionality. With an impressive array of ports, it accommodates a multitude of devices and equipment. From connecting external drives to peripherals, it serves as a centralized hub for all my connectivity needs. The seamless integration of USB, HDMI, and other ports makes it a versatile tool for a variety of tasks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Easy to Use, Compatible with iPad/MBP 2017+
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect smaller size connecter that didn't take up two of the C ports on the left side of my MBP. That left one open for a single USB-C BT connector for my external keyboard, a back up external drive, and two ports on the right side, one for power and another for any other device, like my iPad..Much better than a 7 port connect taking up both ports on the left side...Works great, speeds for data transfer quick- read the ad about all the ports on the device.. you will be happy you bought this... :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile Hub for Enhanced Connectivity - A Four-Star Amazon Review
reviews.reviewText: The Hiearcool USB C Hub has been a reliable companion for expanding the connectivity options on my MacBook Pro and other USB C devices. With its 7-in-1 multi-port functionality, it has proven to be a versatile solution for my various needs.The 4K HDMI output is a standout feature, enabling me to connect my MacBook Pro to external displays or projectors with ease. The video quality is crisp and vibrant, providing an excellent visual experience for presentations or multimedia content.The inclusion of two USB 3.0 ports is practical for connecting various peripherals, such as external hard drives, keyboards, and mice. The transfer speeds have been consistently fast, making data transfers a breeze.The SD and TF card reader has been a convenient addition for quickly accessing and transferring files from my camera's memory cards. It eliminates the need for separate card readers and saves me valuable time during photo and video editing tasks.The 100W Power Delivery (PD) feature is a lifesaver when my MacBook Pro needs a quick recharge. It efficiently charges my laptop while using the hub's other functions simultaneously, without compromising on performance.The compact and sleek design of the hub makes it portable and easy to carry in my laptop bag. It also complements the aesthetics of my MacBook Pro, blending seamlessly with its premium look.While this USB C Hub has been a fantastic addition to my workflow, I did experience occasional connectivity issues when using multiple devices simultaneously. Although the problem was easily resolved by unplugging and reconnecting the hub, it was a minor inconvenience.In conclusion, the Hiearcool USB C Hub is a valuable accessory for MacBook Pro and other USB C laptops, offering an array of ports and functionalities in one compact package. Its 4K HDMI output, USB 3.0 ports, card reader, and Power Delivery support make it an ideal solution for enhanced connectivity on-the-go.Despite the occasional connectivity hiccup, the overall performance and convenience of this hub have earned it a solid four-star rating. If you're in search of a versatile and reliable USB C hub, this Hiearcool offering is undoubtedly worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing does everything well, so far...
reviews.reviewText: Now that laptops are made so thin for portability, I had to buy this adapter device because I needed to output HDMI from laptop to a monitor. Plugging it in the USB-C port, the laptop immediately recognized it and I was able to display contents on a monitor without any device drivers.It also has connectivity for two USB 3.0, an additional USB C and memory cards (can read up to 2 TB).It's light and thin, made for travel. No fuss, no muss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Effective
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Super compact to travel with and supports all connections you may need. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great usb-c huh at great price
reviews.reviewText: The USB-C hub arrived quickly and works very well.
Arrived on time. worked as was advertised. Small and well made.
Produto chegou antes do prazo. Bem embalado e boa qualidade.

Ich benutze den Hiearcool USB C Hub regelmäßig für meine Arbeit und bin sehr zufrieden mit ihm. Der Hub ist sehr vielseitig und bietet 7 Anschlüsse, darunter 4K HDMI-Ausgang, PD TF Kartenleser und 100W Leistung. Die Installation war sehr einfach und der Hub funktioniert einwandfrei mit meinem MacBook Pro und anderen USB C-Geräten.Was den Hiearcool USB C Hub besonders attraktiv macht, ist sein Preis. Im Vergleich zu ähnlichen Produkten anderer Marken ist er deutlich günstiger, aber trotzdem von hoher Qualität und Zuverlässigkeit. Für mich war dies die preiswerteste Alternative zu einem ähnlichen Produkt von Apple, das viel teurer ist.
I purchased it 3 months ago, have used it 3 times and now it does not work. The computer does not recognize it and keeps ejecting it.
